snippet: An air tanker fighting a wildfire near Yosemite National Park in Northern California crashed Tuesday, but there was no immediate word on the state of the plane or the pilot.
abstract: Air tanker fighting a wildfire near Yosemite National Park in Northern California crashes; there is no immediate word on the state of the plane or the pilot, who was the only person aboard.
lead_paragraph: An air tanker fighting a wildfire near Yosemite National Park in Northern California crashed Tuesday, but there was no immediate word on the state of the plane or the pilot.

headline.main: California: Plane That Was Fighting Wildfire Crashes
headline.print_headline: California: Plane That Was Fighting Wildfire Crashes
